MS MCQs

    Understand Microsoft 365 security development and operation - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. What is the correct order for the five core development phases of Microsoft’s SDL?

      Design > Requirements > Implementation > Verification > Release

      Requirements > Design > Implementation > Release > Verification

      Implementation > Requirements > Design > Verification > Release

      Requirements > Design > Implementation > Verification > Release


    2. How does the Microsoft SDL use threat modeling to improve security?

      To verify code meets design specifications before it is checked in

      To identify vulnerabilities in the design of a product or service

      To release code securely across the environment

      To detect and respond to potential security incidents


    3. What category of automated tools does Microsoft use to test and validate how code handles unexpected or untrusted inputs during execution?

      Static code analysis tools

      Binary analysis tools

      Fuzz testing tools

      Component Governance


    4. Which of the following does Microsoft use to test the detection and response capabilities of its services?

      Attack simulation

      Component Governance

      Security awareness training

      Threat modeling


    5. How does Microsoft detect open-source components in its products and services?

      Static code analysis tools

      Binary analysis tools

      Fuzz testing tools

      Component Governance
